entry.title: SysJoker backdoor - no OS is safe!

link.title: SysJoker backdoor - no OS is safe!

entry.summary: New SysJoker backdoor targets windows / MacOS and Linux… Recently researchers at Intezer discovered this new SysJoker backdoor malware after finding signs of it’s activity on a Linux Server back in December 2021. Upon further analysis and investigation they found that this malware had been created to target the 3 major operating systems, while also being capable of being able remaining undetec...

entry.title: Microsoft Defender finally fixes scan exemption exploit

link.title: Microsoft Defender finally fixes scan exemption exploit

entry.summary: Microsoft finally makes bypassing defender scans harder… A little known exploit within Microsoft Defender that allowed anyone, regardless of permissions, to view the system scan exclusions has now finally been fixed. Any user could simply open an unelevated command prompt and run the following command in order to view the defender scan exclusions: reg query "HKLM\SOFTWARE\MICROSOFT\WINDOWS D...

entry.title: My First Blog Post
entry.summary: Intro Welcome to my first blog post! There is nothing special to see here as this is a test blog post to experiment with the Jekyll blog layout.
